Uses of Interface
com.toxic.core.engine.events.ActionEvent

  • Packages that use ActionEvent 
    Package Description
    com.toxic.core.engine.handlers  

    • Uses of ActionEvent in com.toxic.core.engine.handlers

      Methods in com.toxic.core.engine.handlers with parameters of type ActionEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HoldHandler.onHold(ActionEvent e)
      If event starting on specified element, and doesn't change it location EventManager.TIME_TO_NOTIFY_HOLD milliseconds and newer move event location layouts around EventManager.RADIUS_HIT, in contrast to initial event, HoldHandler will be subsequently periodically called.
      void MoveHandler.onMove(ActionEvent e)
      Will be executed when you pressed on element.
      void SelectHandler.onSelect(ActionEvent e)
      Will be executed when selected element.
